name: Butter Fingers
description:
A short Foddian platformer where you play as a slippery stick of butter created for the 2021 Ludwig Jam.

The game is open source with the MIT license, as per the game jam's rules. Here is the GitHub repository.

Credits

The game was programmed and designed by ArjhanToteck. All art assets used were also designed by ArjhanToteck.

JSFXR was used to create the sound effects for the game.

All music in the game is in the public domain (except for one exception, see below). The music, authors, and places they are used are listed below.

- "8-bit theme - Moving Right Along" by Wolfgang was used in the menu, credits, settings, and level select screens.

- "Returning to OpenMPT III" by Spring Spring was used in the first level. This one is available under the CC-BY 4.0,  CC-BY 3.0, CC-BY-SA 4.0, and CC-BY-SA 3.0 licenses, unlike all the others which are public domain.

- "The War Over A Melon Field - Themes and Jingles" by Spring Spring was used in the second level.

- "Boss Battle #6 [8-bit]" by nene was used in the third level.

- "Bossfight by Frenchyboy was used in the fourth level.

Note:

I submitted this mere seconds before the deadline, so there were a few bugs I didn't fix, like how you literally can't beat any level because I accidentally forgot to reset a certain variable, or how I didn't have time to upload the WebGL build so you have to download the game to play it. When the jam ends, I'll upload the update I made that makes the game actually enjoyable.
